AddFollower.label: Add a Follower
AddFollower.description: Add follower to an object of selected type (deals, organizations, persons).

AddParticipantToDeal.label: Add a Participant to a Deal
AddParticipantToDeal.description: Adds a participant to a deal.

AddProductToDeal.label: Add a Product to a Deal
AddProductToDeal.description: Adds a product to the deal.

addRecurringSubscription.label: Add a Recurring Subscription
addRecurringSubscription.description: Adds a new recurring subscription to a deal.

DeleteFollower.label: Delete a Follower
DeleteFollower.description: Delete a follower from a deal.

DeleteAttachedProduct.label: Delete an Attached Product
DeleteAttachedProduct.description: Deletes a product attachment from a deal.

deleteSubscription.label: Delete a Subscription
deleteSubscription.description: Marks an installment or a recurring subscription as deleted.

FindPersonByName.label: Find a Person by Name or Email (Deprecated)
FindPersonByName.description: Searches all persons by their name or email.

findSubscriptionByDeal.label: Find Subscription By Deal
findSubscriptionByDeal.description: Returns details of an installment or a recurring subscription by the deal ID.

GetDeal.label: Get a Deal
GetDeal.description: Returns details of a specific deal.

GetMessage.label: Get a Message
GetMessage.description: Returns data about specific mail message.

GetActivity.label: Get an Activity
GetActivity.description: Returns details of a specific activity.

GetNote.label: Get a Note
GetNote.description: Returns details about a specific note.

GetProduct.label: Get a Product
GetProduct.description: Returns data about a specific product.

getSubscription.label: Get a Subscription
getSubscription.description: Returns details of an installment or a recurring subscription.

GetUser.label: Get a User
GetUser.description: Returns data about a specific user within the company.

ListActivityDeals.label: List Activities in a Deal
ListActivityDeals.description: Lists activities associated with a deal.

listDealsForPerson.label: List Deals for a Person
listDealsForPerson.description: Lists deals associated with a person.

listDealsForProduct.label: List Deals for a Product
listDealsForProduct.description: Returns data about deals that have a product attached to them.

listDealsinOrganization.label: List Deals in an Organization
listDealsinOrganization.description: Lists deals associated with an organization.

GetPipelineDeals.label: List Deals in a Pipeline
GetPipelineDeals.description: Lists deals in a specific pipeline across all its stages.

GetStageDeals.label: List Deals in a Stage
GetStageDeals.description: Lists deals in a specific stage.

ListDealFiles.label: List Files in a Deal
ListDealFiles.description: Lists files associated with a deal.

ListFollowers.label: List Followers
ListFollowers.description: List followers of an object of selected type (deals, organizations, persons, products, users).

ListMailThreads.label: List Mail Threads
ListMailThreads.description: Returns mail threads in specified folder ordered by most recent message within.

ListMessages.label: List Messages in a Thread
ListMessages.description: Get mail messages inside specified mail thread.

listParticipantsOfADeal.label: List Participants of a Deal
listParticipantsOfADeal.description: Lists the participants associated with a deal.

listSubscriptionPayments.label: List Payments of a Subscription
listSubscriptionPayments.description: Returns all payments of an installment or recurring subscription.

ListPersonsInDeal.label: List Persons in a Deal
ListPersonsInDeal.description: Lists all persons associated with a deal, regardless of whether the person is the primary contact of the deal, or added as a participant.

ListProductsInDeal.label: List Products in a Deal
ListProductsInDeal.description: Lists products attached to a deal.

MakeAPICall.label: Make an API Call
MakeAPICall.description: Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

NewEvent.label: New Activity Event
NewEvent.description: Triggers when a new activity is added, updated or deleted.

NewDealEvent.label: New Deal Event
NewDealEvent.description: Triggers when a new deal is added, updated or deleted.

NewNoteEvent.label: New Note Event
NewNoteEvent.description: Triggers when a new note is added, updated or deleted.

NewOrganizationEvent.label: New Organization Event
NewOrganizationEvent.description: Triggers when a new organization is added, updated or deleted.

NewPersonEvent.label: New Person Event
NewPersonEvent.description: Triggers when a new person is added, updated or deleted.

NewProductEvent.label: New Product Event
NewProductEvent.description: Triggers when a new product is added, updated or deleted.

searchDeals.label: Search Deals
searchDeals.description: Retrieves your deals filtered by criteria.

SearchOrganizations.label: Search for Items
SearchOrganizations.description: Performs a search from multiple item types.

searchLeads.label: Search Leads
searchLeads.description: Retrieves your leads filtered by criteria.

SearchObjectsResultAPI.label: Search objects (Deprecated)
SearchObjectsResultAPI.description: This API endpoint has been deprecated by Pipedrive.

searchOrganizations.label: Search Organizations
searchOrganizations.description: Retrieves your organizations filtered by criteria.

searchPersons.label: Search Persons
searchPersons.description: Retrieves your persons filtered by criteria.

searchProducts.label: Search Products
searchProducts.description: Retrieves your products filtered by criteria.

UpdateMailThreadDetails.label: Update a Mail Thread Details
UpdateMailThreadDetails.description: Updates the properties of a mail thread.

UpdateProductAttachmentDetails.label: Update Product Attachment Details
UpdateProductAttachmentDetails.description: Updates product attachment details of the deal-product (a product already attached to a deal).

UploadFile.label: Upload a File
UploadFile.description: Lets you upload a file, and associate it with a Deal, a Person, an Organization, an Activity or a Product.

WatchActivities.label: Watch Activities
WatchActivities.description: Triggers when a new activity is added or updated.

WatchDeals.label: Watch Deals
WatchDeals.description: Triggers when a new deal is added or updated.

watchEmails.label: Watch Emails
watchEmails.description: Triggers when a new email is added to Inbox.

watchLeads.label: Watch Leads
watchLeads.description: Triggers when a new lead is added or updated.

WatchNotes.label: Watch Notes
WatchNotes.description: Triggers when a new note is added or updated.

WatchOrganizations.label: Watch Organizations
WatchOrganizations.description: Triggers when a new organization is added or updated.

WatchPersons.label: Watch Persons
WatchPersons.description: Triggers when a new person is added or updated.

WatchProducts.label: Watch Products
WatchProducts.description: Triggers when a new product is added or updated.

optionsForDeleteFollowers.label: Options for Delete Followers - please delete
